Class IOUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.victims.IOUtils

public final class IOUtils
extends Object

A collection of miscellaneous utilities used throughout the plug-in to format output.

Author:
gmurphy

slurp

public static String slurp(File f)

A gluttonous way of reading file content into memory. Used mostly in testing.

Parameters:

Returns:
The content of the specified file.

report

public static void report(org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log l,
                          String mode,
                          String msg)
A rather lousy way at altering the logging level based on the mode of operation that the rule has been configured for.

Parameters:
l - The log instance to invoke warn, error, or info on.
mode - The mode which determines which log method is invoked.
msg - The message to send to the log.
